section.title: JeVois-Pro Graphical Interface
section.section:
Classes and utilities to provide a graphical interface using Dear ImGui. Supported on JeVois-Pro only. Collaboration diagram for JeVois-Pro Graphical Interface:
Classes
class jevois::GUIeditor
Editor panel for JeVois-Pro GUI.
class jevois::GUIhelper
Helper class to assist modules in creating graphical and GUI elements.
